main.name: Foued SAIDANE
main.description: Freshly graduated full-stack web developer from Digital school of Paris (April 2021).
main.bio: I am an athlete at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit, a knack for online security, and a passion for coding and modeling 3D. Born in a small town in Tunisia, I made my move to Paris  where I graduated with a master's degree in web development at the digital school of Paris, in parallel to my many ongoing projects. I love to create and I tend to have too many projects going on at the same time. Outside of work, I'm a roller, a passionate soccer referee. I love to travel and lead a fairly nomadic lifestyle. I built much of my first portfolio from the beaches of Malaga Spain and I dream of being able to take my work with me when I travel the world..
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

education.description: As part of a very small but talented team, I worked on the entire front end of an airbnb concierge solution. It was a React/Typescript/Javascript/Redux/ and Next.js for the front end, and Symfony/PHP/apiPlateforme and mysql for the backEnd.

Design and development of digital solutions and identify and design digital solutions to develop or enhance the activity of an organization: company, association or administration. I learned to master the computer languages allowing the structuring of databases, the design and development of a web or mobile interface and the optimization of the interaction between the client interface and one or more databases, or even with other applications Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)

work.title: Industrial machine programming
work.description: Programming of a HMI for a control system, acquisition and processing of machine data.

work.title: Web developper
work.description: Programming of a static web solution allowing to display the lists of the various categories of the company's products on a touch screen during an Armed Forces Technology Exhibition.

testimonials.text: Can I say something? Um, I’m the type of person that if you ask me a question and I don’t know the answer, I’m gonna tell you that I don’t know. But I bet you what, I know how to find the answer and I will find the answer.
People work better when they know what the goal is and why. It is important that people look forward to coming to work in the morning and enjoy working.
